data.title: Gordon Orr OBITUARY
data.meta_description: Gordon Orr BOCA RATON, FLA.- Gordon Orr, 84, of Boca Raton, Fla., and Pigeon Forge, Tenn., passed away on March 28, 2016, in Sevierville, Tenn. Gordon was b
data.text: Gordon Orr BOCA RATON, FLA.- Gordon Orr, 84, of Boca Raton, Fla., and Pigeon Forge, Tenn., passed away on March 28, 2016, in Sevierville, Tenn. Gordon was born in Kingston, N.Y., on Dec. 16, 1931. He was retired from IBM, and a former partner of Cypress Pine Nursery and Best Of Christmas. He is predeceased by Father, Judson Orr; mother, Charlotte (Martinez)Orr; brothers, Joseph and Bernard; his first wife, Joan (Dickson) Orr; and his second wife, Shirley (King) Orr. He is survived by Sister, Angela (Orr) Baldwin; sons, Gordon Orr Jr. and wife Kathi (Aber) Orr; Paul Orr and wife Vicky (Rossok) Orr; daughter, Deborah Orr Dettman and husband Thomas Dettman; grandchildren: Michelle Orr Faulk, Amanda Dettman, Brian Orr, Michael Orr, Matthew Dettman, Kyle Orr; great-grandchildren: Austin Williams, Dylan Lanier, Addison and Logan Faulk, Noah and Ryder Dettman, William Orr and expecting Baby Orr; stepchildren: Frank Layton III and Pamela (Layton) Jackson and husband Ken; stepgrandchildren: Rachel, Sarah, and Tabitha Jackson; and his extended family: Edith Yerkes, Pamela, Nuylassy, Robert Sauers, Jr., Edwin ( Jack) Sauers, Margret D Burke, Julie Desch, and many more nieces and nephews. In lieu of flowers, family would like donations to go to: http://4p-supportgroup.org/fundraising/ or https://give.psp.org/
